activities:
Information given to Arvixe LLC is only for use within the Arvixe system and is not to be sold or given to any third-party. The information collected is used solely for the purpose of company records, such as billing and verification, and at all times is available for the user edit in order to keep this information current. 

The security of this data is our first priority and is held protected within the Arvixe database. In order to ensure compliance with the safe harbor principles, we have set up procedures to define the processes required to investigate and resolve alleged infractions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organizational and customer data, including manually processed data.
